Summary: saw two lights one blue one red and two white ones centered bettween the 400ft. span
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting Detailson the way out of my house , my cousin and i saw what was appearded to be two lights one red one blue an they seemed to be a bout 400ft apart and hovering then they switched sides twice an converged in the middle were there appered a third light a clear or white one . i stoped the vehicle an left the car and my cousin alone in the car to walk an get a third wittness my inteiour flashed on and then the lights went crazy moving erraticly in the same general area..slowly they all moved towards the middle then they all went out..a strange thing i had a 3 day old fire smouldering back there ..an when the two outside lights lined up they wqere always directly over the embers from our line of sight as we were walking up on them ,at 300ft away they dissappeared from behind the embered log . this is the second time in 4 months exact spot..i plan on moving bsck there on the bluff as most of my savings are on that land..so how do i greet my new neighbors
